## EditorPlugin.onKeyDown() method

May be provided to prevent the default Edtr.io keyboard shortcuts

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onKeyDown?(e: KeyboardEvent): boolean;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type          | Description                                                                     |
| --------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| e         | KeyboardEvent | the \[KeyboardEvent\](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/KeyboardEvent) |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`false` if the keyboard shortcut should be prevented
